```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(gganimate)
```
```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2020, week = 42)

datasaurus <- tuesdata$datasaurus

ggplot(datasaurus, aes(x=x, y=y, colour=dataset))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_void()+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol = 3)
```
```{r}
datasaurus %>% 
  filter(dataset == "dino") %>% 
  ggplot(aes())
```
